column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////After we were seated
column2: the hostess brought over two glasses of champagne for our birthday celebration.  Then our server stopped by to introduce himself shortly thereafter.  Brandon was one of the best servers I've encountered anywhere.  He was attentive
column5: and was just generally on top of things.  This is what GREAT service is about!  As we discussed the menu
column6: we let him know what items we didn't like last time
column7: and he was very proactive about making other honest recommendations that would better suit our tastes.  After we ordered
column8: they brought out the bread course
column9: and our server was quick to warn us not to fill up on the bread.  And he was right! The rest of the food that evening was spectacular:
